Stainless Steel Extraction and Processin.description: Extraction and processing of surgical-grade stainless steel.
Stainless Steel Extraction and Processin.rationale: Essential for the structural frame of the iPhone.

Rare Earth Elements Mining and Processin.description: Extraction and refining of rare earth elements used in the iPhone's components.

Glass Production.description: Production of textured matte glass for the back of the iPhone.
Glass Production.rationale: Key material for aesthetic and functional purposes.

Transportation of Materials to Assembly.description: Transport of raw materials and components to the assembly facility.
Transportation of Materials to Assembly.rationale: Necessary to move materials to manufacturing sites.

Assembly of iPhone Components.description: Assembling of components like the A16 Bionic chip, display, and camera systems.
Assembly of iPhone Components.rationale: Integral to producing the final smartphone.

Distribution to Retail.description: Shipping of assembled products to global retail locations.
Distribution to Retail.rationale: Essential for delivering the product to consumers.

Consumer Setup and Activation.description: Initial setup activities by the consumer, including software setup and connectivity.
Consumer Setup and Activation.rationale: Necessary for the user to begin using the device.

Daily Use of Device.description: Regular operation by users including calling, internet browsing, and app usage.

Software Updates.description: Regular updates provided by Apple to enhance performance or security.
Software Updates.rationale: Necessary to maintain device performance and security.

Screen Replacement.rationale: Common repair procedure for damaged devices.

N/A.rationale: Process not typically applicable individually. Replacement involves full-life assessment.

Refurbishment Program.description: Apple's program for refurbishing and selling used devices.
Refurbishment Program.rationale: Extends the life cycle of the device and promotes sustainability.

Device Charging.description: Regular charging of the device using electricity.

N/A.rationale: The smartphone does not require water use during normal operation.
Not applicable as no deconstruction is typically required.

Transportation to Recycling Facility.description: Movement of the device to a recycling center.

Material Recovery.description: Recovery of valuable materials from the device.
Material Recovery.rationale: Important for sustainability and resource recovery.

Safe Disposal of Non-Recyclable Parts.description: Proper disposal of parts that cannot be recycled.
